channel.title: [317] i need help too add barrows on the hill not in the coifin area!
channel.description:
well i need help. i want my barrows monsters on the hills and right now they in the coifins and i dont want them there. i tryed auto spawn and that dont work idk why but i need help. *its made by delta*
*note i have team veiwer*

[quote=“hippo429, post:4, topic:345504”]It has to work… if it doesent work you made a mistake[/quote]i swear to u i didnt make no mistake…if u have team viewer ill show u

item.title: [317] i need help too add barrows on the hill not in the coifin area!
item.dc:creator: @bifocaler bifocaler
item.description:
@bifocaler wrote:

[quote=“Joeli, post:2, topic:345504”]Ok,
Go to the coifin area,
Go to the site that you want to add the monster,
and type ::mypos / ::coords
Then open autospawn,(source–>Config–>Autospawn.cfg
Copy any line, and paste it down, then change the id of monster(first number)
and replace the cords (the cords that you want)
then save it and restart your server, it should works ;)[/quote]didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: [317] i need help too add barrows on the hill not in the coifin area!

item.title: [317] i need help too add barrows on the hill not in the coifin area!
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

Ok,
Go to the coifin area,
Go to the site that you want to add the monster,
and type ::mypos / ::coords
Then open autospawn,(source–>Config–>Autospawn.cfg
Copy any line, and paste it down, then change the id of monster(first number)
and replace the cords (the cords that you want)
then save it and restart your server, it should works

Read full topic
